text: Tadera ki pa ache ya diye tara cale? Tadera ki hata ache ya diye tara dhare? Tadera ki cokha ache ya diye tara dekhe? Kimba tadera ki kana ache ya diye tara sune? Baluna, ‘tomara yaderake allah‌ra sarika kareche taderake daka tarapara amara birud'dhe sarayantra kara ebam amake abakasa di'o na [1]’
